name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-yammer-api
title: Yammer REST API web part
shortDescription: This sample shows how Yammer REST APIs can be consumed by using SharePoint Framework React web part and the Yammer JavaScript SDK. The SPFx web part contains wrapper around the Yammer JavaScript SDK that can be extended for fluent typescript api experience.
longDescription: This sample shows how Yammer REST APIs can be consumed by using SharePoint Framework React web part and the Yammer JavaScript SDK. The SPFx web part contains wrapper around the Yammer JavaScript SDK that can be extended for fluent typescript api experience.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
